thread.title: Why are News Organizations Letting Journalists go but Recruiting Technologists?
thread.title_full: Why are News Organizations Letting Journalists go but Recruiting Technologists?

title: Why are News Organizations Letting Journalists go but Recruiting Technologists?
text:
Print Page by: Lucy Kung | The Media Briefing 
"(Interviewee) What skills do you need when you are building stories that are digital from the beginning? You need developers, people who can do still images, multi-media, video and design â€¦ The people I need to do that are almost certainly not in newsrooms." 

A single ratio came to capture the fundamental shift taking place in news organisations as I researched my book Innovators in Digital News, the ratio of digital technologists to journalists.
